# Bringing Data to Life

<div class="section-title">Who We Are</div>

Junto Technologies is a full-service **Contract Research Organization (CRO)** providing innovative, data-driven solutions for the **biotech**, **pharma**, and **healthcare** industries. With over 10 years of combined experience in clinical data analysis and business operations, we deliver scalable, modern solutions tailored to our clients' needs.

<div class="section-title">Capabilities and Expertise</div>

### Key Projects and Experiences
- **Observational Smoking Study**  
  Survey data analysis to understand smoking-related behaviors and outcomes.  
- **IBS Study**  
  Proteomic analysis to identify key protein expressions in Irritable Bowel Syndrome.  
- **Central Line Infection Project**  
  Machine learning for clinical outcomes, focusing on bloodstream infections using **LASSO**, **Random Forest**, and **XGBoost**.  
- **Decision Curve Analysis Python Library**  
  Development of an open-source Python library for healthcare applications.  
- **Electric Vehicle Data Analysis**  
  Exploration of EV population trends and demographics using interactive dashboards.  
- **Bioinformatics Research**  
  Detection and analysis of structural variants in genomic studies with advanced visualizations.  

### Technological Capabilities
- **Programming and Tools:**  
  Python, R, Bash, Oracle Database, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, AWS, EPIC workflows, REDCap, ETL pipelines.  
- **Biostatistics:**  
  Regression (linear/logistic), survival analysis, time series analysis, decision curve analysis.  
- **Machine Learning:**  
  High-Performance Computing (HPC), Large Language Models (LLMs).  
- **Visualization:**  
  Tableau, RShiny, PowerBI, Streamlit.  
- **Data Transformation:**  
  SAS to R and R to SAS translations.  
- **Version Control:**  
  Git, CI/CD.
